# pyfrogsay

A talking frog! Inspired by [pycowsay](https://pypi.org/project/pycowsay/)

## Run
Use pipx to run without permanently installing:

```bash
pipx run pyfrogsay
```

## Run with uvx
Use uvx to run without permanently installing:

```bash
uvx pyfrogsay ộp ộp
```

Output:
```
  -----
< ộp ộp >
  -------
   \
   @..@
  (----)
 ( >__< )
 ^^    ^^
```
